teleportation stone.name: Teleportation Stone
teleportation stone.description: Used automatically in adventures, it can teleport adventurers back to a predefined safe spot to escape danger.
teleportation stone.brief: Every adventurer should carry one of these to stay safe.

weird mushroom.name: Weird Mushroom
weird mushroom.brief: Populating the Enchanted Forest, each one of these mushrooms contains a secret of its own.

forest fruit.name: Forest Fruit
forest fruit.brief: Organic and fresh, these fruits come from of the fantastical trees of the forest. When eaten, they give a quick burst of energy.

fruit salad.name: Fruit Salad
fruit salad.brief: The most nutritious food that can be found, being able to instantly restore the energy of anyone!

wood.name: Wood
wood.brief: Durable wood with magical properties that can be used to craft useful items.

wooden sword.name: Wooden Sword
wooden sword.description: Gain a 20% damage boost when used.
wooden sword.brief: These wooden swords aren't just toys- they can be used in combat to increase your power!

raft.name: Raft
raft.description: Useful for crossing bodies of water.
raft.brief: A low-grade raft, made with haste. The knowledge of how to quickly craft a raft is necessary to adventurers who wish to go on longer journeys.

wooden bow.name: Wooden Bow
wooden bow.description: Gain a 10% regular damage boost and a 10% accuracy boost when used.
wooden bow.brief: A ranged weapon with good accuracy - an excellent weapon for hunting small animals.

herb.name: Herb
herb.description: Your target gains 5% of their current health and gets 5 Recover effects.
herb.brief: Medicinal herbs with powerful healing properties. A dewdrop lies on the largest leaf.

health potion.name: Health Potion
health potion.description: Your target gains 5% of their current health.
health potion.brief: Healing magic in a bottle! This is often useful for healing minor injuries in battle.

power potion.name: Power Potion
power potion.brief: A glass of a liquid that's able to restore stamina.

stone.name: Stone
stone.brief: Tough rocks that are more durable than wood. They're harder to work with when crafting, though - it may take some time to find someone able to craft something out of them.

stone sword.name: Stone Sword
stone sword.description: Gain a 35% regular damage boost when used.
stone sword.brief: A sharpened stone sword, able to deliver heavy blows to its target.

torch.name: Torch
torch.description: Lighting this torch can help you see in the dark. You can also throw it towards enemies to burn them
torch.brief:
"A must-have for any intelligent adventurer", 
- __Adventurers Weekly__

large health potion.name: Large Health Potion
large health potion.description: Your target gains 40% of their current health.
large health potion.brief: A large glass bottle containing liquid with magical healing properties! Useful for instantly recovering from large wounds.

large power potion.name: Large Power Potion
large power potion.brief: The best drink for a thirsty adventurer, second only to Barley's Cocktails!

iron ore.name: Iron Ore
iron ore.description: High quality ore that can be smelted into tough ingots.
iron ore.brief: Mined from the depths of the earth, it can be smelted in order to obtain the valuable iron inside.

iron.name: Iron
iron.brief: A rare metal which is hader and tougher than both wood and stone.

iron sword.name: Iron Sword
iron sword.description: Gain a 45% regular damage boost when used.
iron sword.brief: A standard weapon commonly used by soldiers and guards.

iron crossbow.name: Iron Crossbow
iron crossbow.description: Gain a 25% regular damage boost, a 10% accuracy increase, and a 10% critical chance boost when used.
iron crossbow.brief: A long-ranged weapon with massive durability. This weapon's only purpose is to kill.

goblin staff.name: Goblin Staff
goblin staff.description: Used to escape from low-level goblins.
goblin staff.brief: These staffs represent power and control. Only the chiefs of goblin tribes are ranked high enough to use such holy objects.

berserker axe.name: Berserker Axe
berserker axe.description: Gain a 30% regular damage boost and a 15% critical chance increase. There's an 80% chance to apply 1 berserk effect to yourself when used.
berserker axe.brief: Used by the Ogres, it is a heavy but powerful weapon. It gives the user strength and determination.

crystal.name: Crystal
crystal.brief: One of the toughest materials in the world- it's stronger than wood, stone, and iron!

crystal sword.name: Crystal Sword
crystal sword.brief: A thin and slender sword, crafted with care by a master craftsman. In battle, your opponent's nightmare. At home, a beautiful decoration.

resurrection amulet.name: Resurrection Amulet
resurrection amulet.description: Automatically activated when health or stamina is lowered to 0. Instantly heals you back to 30% of your max health and restores 15 stamina.
resurrection amulet.brief: Each of these unholy amulets represents a pact made with the god of death. People who wear them can cheat death once.
